extensionDescription.message: Changes the color of Firefox tab bar to match the website theme.

reinstallTip.message: Preference data could be corrupted. Please remove the add-on, and re-install the add-on after rebooting Firefox. I’m sorry for your inconvenience!

reportAnIssue.message: Report an issue / submit a suggestion / translate this add-on

resetRuleConfirm.message: Do you want to reset all the rules?

forceModeTooltip_bright.message: Allow tab bar to turn bright (might cause flashing)

forceModeTooltip_dark.message: Allow tab bar to turn dark (might cause flashing)

dynamicModeTooltip.message: Keeps updating tab bar color while browsing within a web page

noThemeColourModeTooltip.message: Always ignore theme color defined by the website

pageIsProtected.message: This page is protected by browser

colourForPlainTextViewer.message: Using color for plain text viewer

errorOccured.message: An error occurred, using fallback color

colourForHomePage.message: Tab bar color for home page can be configured in settings

useDefaultColourForAddon.message: Using specified color for pages related to $1

useRecommendedColourForAddon.message: Recommended color for pages related to $1 is available

specifyColourForAddon.message: Click “Specify a color” to open settings and specify tab bar color for pages related to $1

themeColourIsUnignored.message: Theme color defined by the website is un-ignored

themeColourNotFound.message: Theme color is not found, color is picked from the web page

themeColourIsIgnored.message: Theme color defined by the website is ignored

colourIsPickedFrom.message: Color is picked from an HTML element matching $1

colourIsSpecified.message: Color for this domain is specified in the settings

bacauseThemeColourIsIgnored.message: , because theme color defined by the website is ignored

usingThemeColour.message: Using theme color defined by the website

usingFallbackColour.message: No color is available, using fallback color

colourPickedFromWebpage.message: Color is successfully picked from the web page
